posts.post_content:
Looking for a raw or graded example that is anywhere from VG to EX/MT (3-6 grade). Mainly looking for good color and registration. Don’t need a rare back, Piedmont or SC is fine. No altered cards or creases that detract from the image, centered cards get preference. Shoot me a pic and your price and we can go from there. Thanks!

EDIT: Found one, thanks Frank!
